name: Slash Polygon
description:
Dodge, block the attacks and make counter combo moves. Slash your enemies with different weapons - axes, hammers, swords, halberds and etc. Upgrade your weapon, level up your character, earn battle chests and reach the top.
Battle Modes:
★ Duel 1vs1 — the ranking PVP arena for players. Your skills and reaction will prove more useful than your high-level weapon.
Story Mode — COMING SOON. Challenging arenas with storyline, additional game modes and valuable rewards!
Features:
Quick matches. Strike your opponent in 1x1 PVP duel.
★ Simple controls. Make your enemy suffer from a painful combo with several taps! Master your skills and reaction!
★ Many character Skins. with unique weapons and fighting styles. More characters are coming soon!
★ Deadly Weapons! Acquire dangerous weapons like swords, axes, mallets, spears, staffs, two-hand maces, hammers and etc. Each weapon has it's unique battle style and animations.
★ Upgrade your weapon!
